posts.post_title: T206 Cobb bat on for sale.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brett
t206 Ty Cobb bat on shoulder, piedmont 150 for sale. Its in good condition and only has a light horizontal crease on it. Asking $600 for it. If you would like a scan, just shoot me an e-mail. 

Thanks for looking,

-Brett
